trans-unit.source: The type of the filter data associated with each filter in the table.
trans-unit.target: 与表中每个筛选器关联的筛选数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: Holds a collection of filter/data pairs for efficient matching.
trans-unit.target: 保存筛选器/数据对以进行高效匹配。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601> implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601> 实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> 接口。

trans-unit.source: This filter table is optimized for declarative XPath filters, so the table key is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter>.
trans-unit.target: 此筛选器表针对声明性 XPath 筛选器进行了优化，因此表键为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601> class optimizes matching for a subset of XPath that covers most of the messaging scenarios and also supports the full XPath 1.0 grammar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601> 类针对 XPath 的子集优化了匹配，该类适用于大多数消息处理方案，同时支持完整的 XPath 1.0 语法。

trans-unit.source: It has optimized algorithms for efficient parallel matching.
trans-unit.target: 该类具有适合于高效并行匹配的优化算法。

trans-unit.target: 将 filter/<paramref name="FilterData" />（键/值）对添加到 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable`1" />。

trans-unit.target: 此方法实现 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A> 类的 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The implicit conversion of the `filter` parameter from type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter> can be avoided by using the strongly-typed overload, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601.Add%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a filter/data pair to the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 将筛选器/数据对添加到筛选器表中。

trans-unit.source: This provides a strongly-typed overload for adding an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter> to the filter table that performs better than the weakly-typed overload because it avoids implicit conversion of the `filter` parameter from type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter>.
trans-unit.target: 这可提供强类型重载以将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter> 添加到筛选器表，强类型重载比弱类型重载执行的更好，因为强类型重载可避免将 `filter` 参数从类型 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> 隐式转换为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filter" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filter" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A compiler error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生了编译器错误。

trans-unit.source: Removes all filter/data pairs from the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 从筛选器表中移除所有的筛选器/数据对。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the filter table contains a specified filter and its associated <paramref name="FilterData" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定筛选器表是否包含指定的筛选器及其关联的 <paramref name="FilterData" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the filter/*FilterData* pair is contained in the filter table; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果筛选器表中包含 filter/*FilterData* 对，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the filter is found but corresponds to different data.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了筛选器，但对应不同的数据，则此方法返回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the filter table contains a specified filter.

trans-unit.target: 如果筛选器表中包含 <paramref name="filter" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 此方法实现 `ContainsKey` 的 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> 方法。

trans-unit.target: 当前筛选器表中筛选器/数据对的数目。

trans-unit.target: 此方法实现 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601.GetEnumerator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of exactly one filter in the table is satisfied by the specified message or buffered message and returns that filter in an <see langword="out" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示指定的消息或缓冲消息是否正好满足表中的一个筛选器的匹配条件，然后在 <see langword="out" /> 参数中返回该筛选器。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a message satisfies exactly one of the filters in the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 测试某一消息是否正好符合筛选器表中其中一个筛选器的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="out" /> parameter that stores the filter that is satisfied by the <c>message</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="out" /> 参数，该参数存储 <c>message</c> 符合的筛选器。

trans-unit.source: If no filter was found, the parameter is set to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到筛选器，该参数将设置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of exactly one filter in the table is satisfied by the specified message and returns that filter in an <see langword="out" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示指定的消息是否正好满足表中的一个筛选器的匹配标准，然后在 <see langword="out" /> 参数中返回该筛选器。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when a single filter is expected to match the message and the matching filter is required.

trans-unit.source: This method tests for a single filter match in the highest priority bucket of filters.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by <paramref name="message" />; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 满足表中至少一个筛选器的匹配条件，则为 <paramref name="message" />；如果不满足任何筛选器，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when more than one filter is expected to match the buffered message and only the filter data is required.
trans-unit.target: 当预期有多个筛选器与缓冲消息相匹配，并且只需要筛选数据时，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The filter data of the matching <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter> objects are stored in the `results`<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 匹配的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter> 对象的筛选数据存储在 `results`<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 中。

trans-unit.source: This method implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingValues%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingValues%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="results" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="results" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator" />。

trans-unit.source: The reference parameter that stores the filter data of the matching filters in a generic <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /><<c>FilterData</c>>.
trans-unit.target: 在泛型 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /><<c>FilterData</c>> 中存储匹配筛选器的筛选数据的引用参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of at least one <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator" /> in the table is satisfied by the <paramref name="navigator" /> and adds the filter data of the matching filters to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator" /> 是否满足表中至少一个 <paramref name="navigator" /> 的匹配条件，然后将匹配筛选器的筛选数据添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by the <paramref name="navigator" />; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 满足表中至少一个筛选器的匹配条件，则为 <paramref name="navigator" />；如果不满足任何筛选器，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when more than one filter is expected to match the query criteria of the XML document derived from the optimized XPath navigator <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator> and only the filter data is required.
trans-unit.target: 当预期会有多个筛选器与派生自优化的 XPath 导航器 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator> 的 XML 文档的查询条件相匹配，并且只需要筛选数据时，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The filter data of the matching <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter> objects are stored in the `results` parameter of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 匹配的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter> 对象的筛选数据存储在 `results` 的 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 参数中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="results" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="results" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />。

trans-unit.source: The reference parameter that stores the filter data of the matching filters in a generic <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /><<c>FilterData</c>>.
trans-unit.target: 在泛型 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /><<c>FilterData</c>> 中存储匹配筛选器的筛选数据的引用参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of at least one <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> in the table is satisfied by the <paramref name="navigator" /> and adds the filter data of the matching filters to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 是否满足表中至少一个 <paramref name="navigator" /> 的匹配条件，然后将匹配筛选器的筛选数据添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by the <paramref name="navigator" />; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 满足表中至少一个筛选器的匹配条件，则为 <paramref name="navigator" />；如果不满足任何筛选器，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when more than one filter is expected to match the query criteria of the XML document derived from the optimized XPath navigator <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator> and only the filter data is required.
trans-unit.target: 当预期会有多个筛选器与派生自优化的 XPath 导航器 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator> 的 XML 文档的查询条件相匹配，并且只需要筛选数据时，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The filter data of the matching <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter> objects are stored in the `results` parameter of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 匹配的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter> 对象的筛选数据存储在 `results` 的 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 参数中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="results" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="results" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable`1" /> is not read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable`1" /> 不是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" /> associated with the filter data to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 与要获取或设置的筛选数据关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the filter data associated with the specified <paramref name="filter" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与指定的 <paramref name="filter" /> 关联的筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: The filter data associated with the <paramref name="filter" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <paramref name="filter" /> 关联的筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: If the specified <paramref name="filter" /> is not found, a get operation throws a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> and a set operation creates a new filter data element with the specified <paramref name="filter" /> as key.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到指定的 <paramref name="filter" />，get 操作会引发 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" />，而 set 操作会创建一个以指定的 <paramref name="filter" /> 作为键的新筛选数据元素。

trans-unit.source: The `Item` property (the indexer in C#) provides the ability to access the filter data associated with a `filter` in the table's filter collection by using the following syntax.
trans-unit.target: `Item` 属性（C# 中的索引器）可通过使用下面的语法提供访问与表的筛选器集合中的 `filter` 关联的筛选数据的功能。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the `Item` property to add new elements by setting the values of a `filter`/filter data pair that does not exist in the action filter table.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 `Item` 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置操作筛选器表中不存在的 `filter`/filter data 对的值。

trans-unit.source: However if `filter` is already in the table, setting the `Item` property overwrites the old value.
trans-unit.target: 然而，如果表中已经存在 `filter`，则设置 `Item` 属性将会覆盖旧值。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601.Add%2A> method does not modify the filter data of an existing `filter`.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601.Add%2A> 方法不会修改现有的 `filter` 的筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary `Item` is a `filter`/filter data pair in the case of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 词典 `Item` 为 `filter` 中的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601>/filter data 对。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filter" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filter" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A compiler error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生了编译器错误。

trans-unit.source: The property is retrieved and the <paramref name="filter" /> is not in the table.
trans-unit.target: 已检索该属性，并且 <paramref name="filter" /> 不在表中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the filters contained in the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable`1" /> 中包含的所有筛选器的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of all the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" />s contained in the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器表中包含的所有 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" />。

trans-unit.source: This property implements <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602.Keys%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性实现 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602.Keys%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> that the filter table implements uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> as the key and the `FilterData` as the value of the pair.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器表实现的 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> 将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> 用作对的键并将 `FilterData` 用作对的值。

trans-unit.source: The order of the filters returned in the collection is unspecified, but it is guaranteed to be the same order as the corresponding `FilterData` in the collection returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 未指定集合中返回的筛选器的顺序，但可以保证此顺序与 `FilterData` 属性所返回的集合中相应 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601.Values%2A> 的顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of XML document nodes that can be examined by the individual filters during a single call to a <see langword="Match" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 XML 文档节点的最大数目，这些文档节点在单一调用 <see langword="Match" /> 方法期间可由单个筛选器检查。

trans-unit.source: This value applies for each filter.
trans-unit.target: 此值适用于每个筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The number of nodes that can be examined.
trans-unit.target: 可检查的节点数。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to alleviate a security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于解决安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Some filters can be extremely expensive to evaluate or are very long-running.
trans-unit.target: 某些筛选器的开销极大评估或非常长时间运行。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter>s are most often evaluated against a document from an untrusted source (SOAP message off the wire), which may be malicious.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter>s 最常计算针对来自不受信任源 （从线路的 SOAP 消息），这可能是恶意的文档中。

trans-unit.source: Because filters operate on XML documents, the best way to set computational limits on filter tables is to specify the maximum number of nodes that are examined while evaluating a filter in this table.
trans-unit.target: 因为筛选器在 XML 文档上执行，所以对筛选器表设置计算限制的最好方法是指定评估此表中的筛选器时所检查的最大节点数。

trans-unit.source: Removes a filter and its associated filter data from the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 从筛选器表中移除筛选器及其关联的筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2" /> <Filter, <c>FilterData</c>> to remove from the table.
trans-unit.target: 要从表中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2" /> <Filter, <c>FilterData</c>>。

trans-unit.source: Removes a filter and its associated filter data from the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 从筛选器表中移除筛选器及其关联的筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the filter/<paramref name="FilterData" /> pair was found and removed; <see langword="false" /> if it was not found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了 filter/<see langword="true" /> 对并将其移除，则为 <paramref name="FilterData" />；如果未找到，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the filter key of the `item` is present but is associated with data that differs from the `FilterData`, the method fails to remove the filter and returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 `item` 的筛选键，但此筛选键与不同于 `FilterData` 的数据相关联，则此方法将无法移除筛选器并返回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes a filter and its associated filter data from the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 从筛选器表中移除筛选器及其关联的筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the filter was found and removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了筛选器并将其移除，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filter" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filter" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filter" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filter" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" /> and its associated filter data from the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 从筛选器表中移除 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" /> 及其关联的筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" /> was found and removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" /> 并将其移除，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does not throw an exception if the specified filter does not exist in the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的筛选器在筛选器表中不存在，此方法不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filter" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filter" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filter" /> is not an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filter" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个可循环访问筛选器表的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /><KeyValuePair<Filter, FilterData>> that can be used to iterate through the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于循环访问筛选器表的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /><KeyValuePair<Filter, FilterData>>。

trans-unit.source: This method implements <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601.GetEnumerator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法实现 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601.GetEnumerator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Compacts the filter table, purging any excess allocations or buffers.
trans-unit.target: 压缩筛选器表，清除任何过多的分配或缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This method is conceptually equivalent to setting a collection's capacity to its count.
trans-unit.target: 此方法基本上等效于将集合的容量设置为其计数。

trans-unit.source: A key to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: 用于检索数据的键。

trans-unit.source: The <c>data</c> associated with the <c>filter</c> when this method returns <see langword="true" />; otherwise, the default value for the type of the <c>data</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回 <see langword="true" /> 时，则返回与 <c>filter</c> 关联的 <c>data</c>；否则，将返回 <c>data</c> 参数的类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether a filter is stored in the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 检查筛选器是否存储在筛选器表中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="filter" /> is present in the filter table; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果筛选器表中存在 <paramref name="filter" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is an efficient way to check whether a filter is in the filter table because when the filter is not present it returns `false` instead of throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在检查筛选器是否在筛选器表中时，此方法是一种有效的方法，因为如果筛选器不存在，则此方法会返回 `false`，而不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If you try to retrieve the filter from the table using its `Item` property (the indexer in C#) and it is not there, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试使用筛选器的 `Item` 属性（C# 中为索引器）从表中检索筛选器，并且此筛选器在表中不存在，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the <paramref name="FilterData" /> contained in the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <paramref name="FilterData" /> 中包含的所有 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable`1" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of all the <paramref name="FilterData" /> contained in the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器表中包含的所有 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> 的 <paramref name="FilterData" />。

trans-unit.source: This property implements <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602.Values%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性实现 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602.Values%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602><Filter, `FilterData`> that the filter table implements uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> as the key and the `FilterData` as the value of the pair.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器表实现的 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602><Filter, `FilterData`> 将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> 用作该对的键并将 `FilterData` 用作该对的值。

trans-unit.source: The order of the `FilterData` returned in the collection is unspecified, but it is guaranteed to be the same order as the corresponding filters in the collection returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 未指定集合中返回的 `FilterData` 的顺序，但可以保证此顺序与 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilterTable%601.Keys%2A> 属性所返回的集合中相应筛选器的顺序相同。
